body_html: As suggested in the logs, try using the --verbose_failures flag for bazel to get the exact command being executed that fails. Then you should be able to execute that command and get more information as to the cause of the failure.
body_text: As suggested in the logs, try using the --verbose_failures flag for bazel to get the exact command being executed that fails. Then you should be able to execute that command and get more information as to the cause of the failure.
body: As suggested in the logs, try using the `--verbose_failures` flag for bazel to get the exact command being executed that fails. Then you should be able to execute that command and get more information as to the cause of the failure.
